Hymenaei: or The solemnities of masque, and barriers magnificently performed on the eleventh, and twelfth nights, from Christmas; at court: to the auspicious celebrating of the marriage-vnion, betweene Robert, Earle of Essex, and the Lady Frances, second daughter to the most noble Earle of Suffolke. By Ben: Ionson. Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.
[44] p.
Printed by Valentine Sims for Thomas Thorp, At London : 1606.
Partly in verse. Signatures: A-E⁴ F² . The first leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

By Ben: Ionson. Jonson, Ben, 1573?-1637.
[44] p.
Printed by Valentine Sims for Thomas Thorp, At London : 1606.
Partly in verse. Signatures: A-E⁴ F² . The first leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
